name: Zomblox
description:
I messed up and didn't include the data folder. Here is a link including the data folder (and no other changes made of course) https://dalucanator.itch.io/zombloxfixed

Also UI messes up at 1080p or lower. woops

My submission for GMTK 2018 and my first ever game

Zomblox - a top down shooter without shooting.

wasd movement. 

"1" "2" "3" to change block types, and left mouse to place them.

walk into the lights when they're green to stock up on  random blocks.

Assets used: "04b_09" typeface
